name: Sweet Dreams (CWRU-EECS390)
description:
The Dream Team from Cleveland Institute of Art and Case Western Reserve University Game Media Production I & III brings you: Sweet Dreams. Sweet Dreams is a roguelike bullet hell twin-stick shooter set in a dream where you fight to maintain the balance of a perfect night’s sleep.
It’s bedtime!  It’s a school night - and you have to get a good night's sleep in order to function well in class. You’re cuddled up in your favorite onesie and you drift off to sleep...but now you’re stuck in a dream where your possessions are hostile!
In order to wake up from this dream well rested, you have to keep your sleep in balance. Sleeping too light will make paying attention in class difficult, and sleeping too deeply will make you late for class!
Defend yourself against your possessions with the power of your onesies! Unlock all 4 Onesies! By defeating the ones guarding them... Fight both Light Sleep and Deep Sleep enemies along the way to get the perfect night's sleep!
Defeat the ultimate onesie and get to your bed to wake up from the dream well rested! Controls: Move - WASD Aim - Mouse Cursor Primary Fire - Left Click Secondary Fire - Right Click (with cooldown) Use item - F or Space Select Onesie - Number row (cooldown between swaps) Pause Game - Escape How to play: 1) Download correct version for your operating system. 2) Unzip the folder. 3) On PC, go into the folder and run Sweet Dreams.exe. On Mac, double click the Sweet Dreams game. 4) Choose your resolution and graphics settings, and click play!
